title_info.title: Basic Electronics
title_info.unit_desc: Using Diodes to force Electric Current to flow in a particular direction

info_dialog:
Lesson Preface 1/2
Building upon what we learnt in lesson 1 & 2, in this lesson we will learn how to control the direction of current in circuits using Diodes

Lesson Preface 2/2
After this lesson you’ll be able to:

<Objective 2>
<Objective 3>

Circuit Building
Now you will build a circuit that forces current to move in  one direction.
